0.sopdetails:
• If Customer has not provided any information about fiducials &tooling holes, then add LT standard fiducials and tooling holes.
  • In Customer drawing given Fiducials info and Tolling hole info not given then add LT standard  tooling hole.
  • In Customer drawing given Tooling hole info and Fiducials info not given then add LT standard Fiducials.
  • For all arrays always need to add Tooling hole and Fiducials (For QSDM no need to add tooling hole).
  • For " Malibu" Customer jobs if the customer provides data in panel and there are no tooling holes provided in the array. Then please do not add them.                                                                                                                                                  Customer mail dated 09.02.2016
  • LT Standard Fiducials and Tooling hole refer below table.
0.subtopic:
Check Customer Drawing for Fiducials, Tooling Holes & Thieving. If no info add LT Standard. Always add Tooling
and fiducial in unipanel.
